I am involved in research at St. Olaf with Dr. [Piercarlo Valdesolo](https://www.valdesolo.com), a psychology professor specializing in emotions research. Our current project examines the feelings of gratitude that immigrants have and feel they ought to have toward their country of resettlement. 

![We prepared this research poster to be presented at MPA in Chicago this spring.](Research_psychology_poster.jpg)
